headline.main: NAZIS MAKE STAND; Allied Planes Lash at Axis as Rear Guard Faces 8th Army AMERICANS DRIVE AHEAD Start Fierce Attacks From El Guettar Area -- In North the British Push Back Axis NAZIS MAKE STAND TO NORTH OF GABES

lead_paragraph: ALLIED HEADQUARTERS IN NORTH AFRICA, April 1 -- The Eighth Army has now pushed through hastily constructed enemy rear-guard defenses beyond Oudref to a new line of prepared positions erected by Field Marshal General Erwin Rommel in the region north of Gabes, where the Desert Fox apparently is making at least a temporary stand.
abstract: port largely used by Axis for Tunis aid
